variables.name: breakpoints
variables.value:
(
    'desktop': size(breakpoint, desktop),
    'tablet': size(breakpoint, tablet),
    'mobile': size(breakpoint, mobile)
)

variables.name: colors
variables.value:
(
    main: #283A6A,
    accent: #F79727,
    lblue: #F3F5F9,
    mapblue: #4A90E2,
    dgrey: #444444,
    white: #fff,
    lgrey: #A2A1A2,
    mapgreen: #30B6B5,
)

variables.name: sizes
variables.value:
(
    inner: (
        desktop: 1040px, // 1400 - ...
        tablet: 700px, // 768 - 1024
        mobile: 320px // 0 - 767
    ),
    breakpoint: (
        desktop: 1400px, // 1025 up
        tablet: 1024px, // 768 up
        mobile: 767px // 0 up
    )
)

variables.name: font-sizes
variables.value:
(
    body: 18px,
    body-m: 16px,
    small: 14px,
    small-m: 14px,
    h1: 44px,
    h1-m: 36px,
    h2: 36px,
    h2-m: 30px,
    standfirst: 22px,
    standfirst-m: 18px,
    timeline: 36px,
    big: 70px
)

variables.name: offsets
variables.value:
(
    s: 5px,
    main: 10px,
    default: 35px,
    l: 20px,
    xl: 50px,
    xxl: 100px
)
